    Author:

      Checks if the supplied long would fit in an unsigned 32 bit integer.

      • fitsUnsigned32BitInteger

        public static boolean fitsUnsigned32BitInteger(long longValue)
        Checks if the supplied long would fit in an unsigned 32 bit integer.

        In essence this checks if longValue >= 0 && longValue <= 0xffffffffL

        Parameters:
        longValue - Long value to check
        Returns:
        true if the long value fits as an unsigned 32 bit value
